product_name: REI Sub Kilo 15 Sleeping Bag - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The Sub Kilo +15 left-hand zip sleeping bag by REI is made for 3-season camping, backpacking and ultralight adventures. Features premium 750-fill-power goose down insulation and a downproof ripstop polyester shell and soft polyester taffeta lining. Designed for women, with a narrow cut at the shoulders and more width at the hips. Vertical Baffle construction lets the goose down remain fully lofted and keeps it from shifting and migrating, preventing cold spots. Contoured hood, roomy footbox, full-length locking zipper, full-length draft tube and draft collar all keep body heat in and cold air out. Internal pocket keeps all your essentials-headlamp, watch, glasses-close at hand and easy to find in the dark. Differentiated drawcords (1 round, 1 flat) let you adjust hood and neck easily, even in the dark. Pad loops provide attachment points to keep your sleeping bag and pad together to avoid rolling off onto the cold ground (straps not included). Comes with stuff sack and large cotton storage bag. Left-hand zip design lets you zip the REI Sub Kilo +15 bag to compatible right-hand zip bags to create a double bed. Special buy.
short_description: The Sub Kilo +15 left-hand zip sleeping bag by REI is made for 3-season camping, backpacking and ultralight adventures.
